summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff shows multiple functional/UI/backend changes; since nothing was requested, these constitute unrequested (hallucinated) features relative to the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated backend domain model and authorization/storage integration (access control state, authorization mixin, storage mixin, and multiple entity types/maps like TestBench/Document/Component/UserProfile/HistoryEntry).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so backend feature additions are not traceable to any request.

hallucinated_features.description: AppShell UI changes: updated navigation (Dashboard/Test Benches/Profile), theme toggle, sign-out, responsive mobile nav, and Safran logo sizing adjustments.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so UI/navigation changes are unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Bench history UI enhancement: show user avatar and name for history entries by fetching public user info; fallback to shortened principal; sort history by timestamp.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so this new UI behavior is unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Sign-in page redesign/behavior: branded card layout, Safran logo with onError fallback, login error alert, and updated copy.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so sign-in UI changes are unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional frontend features described in summaries: AuthGate/AdminGate, error boundary, profile management enhancements (avatar selection/custom upload, email domain validation), dashboard analytics changes, benches list/detail updates, admin page panels, new/updated query hooks, validation/search utilities, styling/theme system updates, tailwind config changes, expiration settings utilities.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these features cannot be justified against requested scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updated to describe UI updates and add pending feature requests AR-1/AR-2.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; this adds scope/context not requested.
